short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables keyboard navigation, writes hover text to the page, and makes it convenient to access Explain xkcd

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browse xkcd using your keyboard and see the hover text for a comic without having to hover over it with your mouse. Great for catching up on comics you've missed or digging through the archives.

Use the arrow keys to quickly move through the archive, or press 'R' to jump to a random comic.

Feel like you're missing the nuances of a particular comic? Press the 'E' key to open up the explain xkcd page for it.
